price: Yoo isaan isiniif hin awwaatin, beekaa inni (Qur’aanni kun) kan buufame beekumsa Rabbiitiin akka ta’eefi Isa malees gabbaramaan haqaa akka hin jirre. Sila isin Muslima hin taatanuu? (Muslima ta’aa jedhiin).
arabic: فَإِلَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلۡمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-illam yastajībū lakum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā unzila biʿil'mi al-lahi wa-an lā ilāha illā huwa fahal antum mus'limūna
